title: Purchased Name Change, regretting it.
body: Basically, I just bought a name change today, but I'm regretting the purchase (I came up with better the game after) I'd like to request if I could get a refund or possibly support giving me a second rename? Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
You can refund the name change so long as your previous summoner name was not already taken, according to our [*Refund Policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ). You'll need to write a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) into us with the Ticket Subject: "Name Change Reversal". 

I hope that helps!
May i please get some help with this? It hasn't even been 24 hours yet.
